metadata.title: CVE-2015-20108 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: xml_security.rb in the ruby-saml gem before 1.0.0 for Ruby allows XPathinjection and code execution because prepared statements are not used.

criterions.comment: ruby-saml: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
